content.p: Assistant Professor, Dr Lee Mei Kee obtained her MPharm (Hons) and PhD from the University of Nottingham. After completing her PhD, she worked as a part-time teaching practitioner in the School of Pharmacy at University of Nottingham Malaysia, before joining as full-time staff in 2019. She is involved in teaching pharmacology and human physiology. Dr Lee is a Fellow of the Higher Education Academy (FHEA). She is also a member of Dr Lee is the module convener of the following modules: Dyspepsia, Digestive System and Human Physiology.
